segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo visārado agāraṃ ajjhāvasati.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a female living at home with five qualities is self-assured.

segments.pli: Pāṇātipātā paṭivirato ca hoti, adinnādānā paṭivirato ca hoti, kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato ca hoti, musāvādā paṭivirato ca hoti, surāmerayamajjappamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato ca hoti—
segments.en: She doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, lie, or consume alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo visārado agāraṃ ajjhāvasatī”ti.
segments.en: A female living at home with these five qualities is self-assured.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, a female living at home with five qualities…

suttaplex.blurb: A woman with five qualities lives confidently at home.
